races.name: Human
races.description: Humans are the most common race in Mordor. They possess average abilities and are able to excel in any guild or class.

races.name: Dwarf
races.description: Dwarves are a strong and hearty race, native to underground tunnels and caverns. They are natural warriors with a strong resistance to poisons.

races.name: Elf
races.description: Elves are an agile and intelligent race. They excel at magic and are very dexterous, but they are also physically weak.

races.name: Gnome
races.description: Gnomes are a small, playful, and intelligent race with strong magical abilities. They are known to be physically weak but very wise.

races.name: Hobbit
races.description: Hobbits are small and charming creatures. Their small stature allows them to sneak around unnoticed. They have a natural ability to escape from danger, but they lack strength and magical abilities.

races.name: Half-Orc
races.description: Half-Orcs are a very strong, yet unintelligent race. They are the most powerful warriors in the land, but they lack magical ability and charisma.
